channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: Expect chaos when Danny and Mick drop into the Mash-Up studio. Stephen Mulhern plays a game of Truth or Dare, and Kia Pegg has a Slime Sealed Delivered surprise! BBC Asian Network DJs Nikita Kanda and Noreen Khan join in the fun, there is a very silly game of Senseless and two more episodes of SpongeBob Squarepants.
